濈字的基本解释

濈
jí
〔濈濈〕聚集的样子，如“尔羊来思，其角濈濈。”
〔濈然〕ａ．汗出的样子，如“濈濈汗出者愈。”ｂ．迅速的样子，如“翔尔鸿翥，濈濈凫没。”

濈
shà
〔??（

濈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jí］
［《廣韻》阻立切，入緝，莊。］
(1)见“濈濈”。
(2)水外流；汗出。
(3)迅速貌。《文选·曹植〈七启〉》：“翔爾鴻翥，濈然鳧没。”李善注：“濈，疾貌也。”一说沉貌。李周翰注：“濈然，沉貌。”

濈字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　濈； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页654第29
【唐韻】阻立切【集韻】【韻會】側立切【正韻】側入切，?音戢。【說文】和也。【詩·小雅】其角濈濈。　又【埤蒼】濈水行出也。【張衡·南都賦】流湍投濈。　又疾貌。【曹植·七啓】濈然鳧沒。　又【集韻】實洽切，音萐。?濈，湍流。

濈字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
濈字的起名意思

暂无。

濈
Basic explanation of words
濈
jí
[濈濈] The appearance of gathering, such as "You sheep come to think, its horns are 濈濈."
[Yi Ran] a. The appearance of sweating, such as "the one who sweats will heal." b. He looked swift, like "Xiang'er Hongzhu, I'm not."
濈
shà
〔?? (
濈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jí］
["Guangyun" obstructs Liqie, enters the arrest, Zhuang. ]
(1) See "濈濈".
(2) Water outflows; sweating.
(3) Quick appearance. "Selected Works · Cao Zhi "Seven Qi"": "Xiang'er Hongzhu, but ran out." Li Shan's note: "Illness, ill appearance." One said Shen Mian. Li Zhouhan's Note: "Yuan, Shen looks."
濈
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Zi Department] 　濈; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 654 29
[Tang Yun] Resistant Li Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] Side Li Cut [Zheng Yun] Side Cut,? Sound 戢. [Said Wen] He also. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Its corners are 濈濈濈.　[Picang] Again, I can go out of Jishui. 【Zhang Heng·Nandu Fu】Liu Tuan casts a shadow.　I'm sick again. 【Cao Zhi·Qiqi】It's gone.　[Jiyun] Really and fluently.濈, turbulence.
